user_prompt: 装扮成时尚穿搭师并提供个性化的时尚建议。
作为一名考试指导老师，提出如何在学习过程中扩大知识面，增强备考能力的方法。

You will be acting as a virtual assistant. Clients can ask you to do anything from scheduling appointments to booking tickets or making reservations. Your responses should always be prompt and helpful. My first request is "I need help booking a flight to London."
扮演一位历史学家，让我了解过去的文化和习俗。
假装你是一名艺术家，为我创作出一幅独特的油画作品。
裝扮成一個文化導遊，為游客介紹中國歷史、文化與傳統。
帮助用户排序优先级最高的事件，并提供相关建议。

I want you to act as a virtual tour guide, taking me around an imaginary world. You should describe the different places and their features in great detail. I will give you directions on where to go next. My first prompt is take me to a mountain.
随机安排一些小游戏，来考察我的反应能力和学习速度。

Let's play Hangman. You should generate a word (5-7 letters) and start a game by giving me a hint about what the word might be. For each wrong letter guess, you should draw one part of the hangman diagram. At the end, you should reveal the answer if I haven't guessed correctly.
假装是一个旅行者，给我讲述你今天在新的国家中所看到的有趣事物
担任一名时尚达人，分享最新流行的服装风格。
Act as an interior designer. Please provide advice on how to decorate our living room in order to make it look more modern and stylish.
Act as an interior designer and share ideas for sprucing up my home.
Pose as a nutritionist and provide suggestions for a healthy diet.
假装你是一名烹饪大师，分享最新的菜肴和食谱。
扮演一位運動教練，與我們分享合理的運動方法以及如何建立健康的生活習慣。
模拟一名厨师，根据我的要求来制作菜肴。
假装你是一个社会工作者，帮助弱势群体找到适当的就业机会。
Pretend you are a sports coach and provide strategies to improve an athlete's performance in their chosen sport.

Pose as a virtual financial advisor. I will ask you questions about investments, and you should provide advice based on your knowledge of finance and the current market situation. My first request is: "What stocks would be best to invest in right now?"
Pretend you are a career coach and give me advice on how to improve my resume and increase the chances of getting an interview.

Pretend you are a teacher and provide me with tips on studying for an upcoming test.

Act as a financial advisor - provide me with advice on how to invest my money wisely.
Pretend to be a chef and offer advice on how to prepare delicious meals.

Be a virtual tour guide and provide interesting facts about the area I'm visiting.

Pose as a motivational coach who can help individuals set goals and stay motivated.

Pose as an engineer and discuss the importance of safety protocols in the workplace.
Impersonate a travel agent and provide advice on the best places to visit around the world based on my interests and budget.
Act as a customer service representative and answer my questions about the product I'm interested in buying.

Become a fashion consultant and provide advice on how to dress for different occasions. My request is "What should I wear to my friend\'s wedding?"

Become a career coach. Offer advice on finding the right job and creating a winning resume, as well as giving guidance on how to tackle job interviews and negotiate salary.

Be a personal shopper and suggest the best products for me to buy online.

I want you to act as an entrepreneur. You need to come up with a creative business idea that could potentially become profitable and explain how it would be implemented. My first suggestion request is "I\'m looking for ways to develop a sustainable online marketplace for organic products."
我想你能帮助我安排一趟旅行。你需要根据我提出的目的地、日期、预算和航班信息来协助安排行程。例如：“我想今年8月去德国法兰克福一趟，请为我安排一个行程。”
